      Remove an upgrade from an UberItem, which is traditionally done through the clickedInInventoryAction method Checks if the requested upgrade is already on the item, if so remove the upgrade, cancel the event, and consumes the upgrade item NOTE: Upgrade name must be [a-z0-9A-Z/._-]

      • enforcePermissions

        public static boolean enforcePermissions(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                         UberItem item)
        Return whether or not the give player has the proper permissions to use a given UberItem Can be used to restrict access to code depending on whether or the player has proper permissions USAGE: if (enforcePermissions) return;
        Parameters:
        player - the player being tested for permissions
        item - the UberItem
        Returns:
        whether or not to enforce permissions (true = restrict code, false = allow the code to run)

      • stringToLore

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> stringToLore(java.lang.String string,
                                                            int characterLimit,
                                                            org.bukkit.ChatColor prefixColor)
        Wrap the text from a string onto multiple lines, can be used to easily write item lore. "/newline" can be used to force a new line
        Parameters:
        string - the source string
        characterLimit - the maximum number of characters per line
        prefixColor - the color that the text is to be
        Returns:
        the wrapped text, in multiple lines

      • searchFor

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack searchFor(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inv,
                                                       UberItem uber)
        Search through an inventory to find the first instance of an item belonging to uber
        Parameters:
        inv - the inventory being searched through
        uber - the requested UberItem type
        Returns:
        the first found instance of uber in the inventory (or null if none found)

      • enforceCooldown

        public static boolean enforceCooldown(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                      java.lang.String key,
                                      double seconds,
                                      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                      boolean throwError)
        Return whether or not 'seconds' seconds have passed since the previous time 'player' used 'key' action with 'item'. Can be used to restrict access to code depending on whether or not the cooldown is over. USAGE: if (enforceCooldown) return;
        Parameters:
        player - the player holding the item
        key - a string specifying which action is being tested (can be any string that you want)
        seconds - the minimum time since the action to allow another action use
        item - the UberItem being tested
        throwError - whether or not to warn the player of the failure to execute the action, and the time remaining
        Returns:
        whether or not to enforce the cooldown (true = restrict code, false = allow the code to run)

      • applyUpgrade

        public static void applyUpgrade(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event,
                                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                java.lang.String upgradeName,
                                java.lang.String upgradeDescription)
        Apply an upgrade to an UberItem, which is traditionally done through the clickedInInventoryAction method. Checks if the requested upgrade is already on the item, if not adds it, cancels the event, and consumes the upgrade item. NOTE: Upgrade name must be [a-z0-9A-Z/._-]
        Parameters:
        player - the player holding the item
        event - an InventoryClickEvent, adding an upgrade to an item is meant to be done by dropping an item on the UberItem
        item - the UberItem in ItemStack form
        upgradeName - the name of the upgrade
        upgradeDescription - the description of the upgrade

      • unapplyUpgrade

        public static void unapplyUpgrade(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event,
                                  org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                  java.lang.String upgradeName)
        Remove an upgrade from an UberItem, which is traditionally done through the clickedInInventoryAction method Checks if the requested upgrade is already on the item, if so remove the upgrade, cancel the event, and consumes the upgrade item NOTE: Upgrade name must be [a-z0-9A-Z/._-]
        Parameters:
        player - the player holding the item
        event - an InventoryClickEvent, removing an upgrade from an item is meant to be done by dropping an item on the UberItem
        item - the UberItem in ItemStack form
        upgradeName - the name of the upgrade

      • hasUpgrade

        public static boolean hasUpgrade(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                 java.lang.String upgradeName)
        Parameters:
        item - the UberItem in ItemStack form
        upgradeName - the name of the upgrade
        Returns:
        whether or not the UberItem has the upgrade

      • getUpgradeDescription

        public static java.lang.String getUpgradeDescription(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                                     java.lang.String upgradeName)
        Parameters:
        item - the UberItem in ItemStack form
        upgradeName - the name of the upgrade
        Returns:
        the description of the upgrade (or " " if there is no such upgrade)

      • getUpgrades

        public static java.lang.String[] getUpgrades(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Parameters:
        item - the UberItem in ItemStack form
        Returns:
        an array of String, elements consisting of the upgrades on this particular item
